title: [Large-scale] Language Education Assessment and Communication Strategy Improvement Process for Children with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of special education or language education (language development stages, communication disorder characteristics), LMS proficiency, and understanding of fundamental grammar and vocabulary assessments
context.additional_context: Participants analyze language development characteristics (expressive/receptive/pragmatic skills) and assessment tools for children with intellectual disabilities. Through project-based evaluation, they develop practical educational strategies (communication facilitation activities, tailored instructional materials) for real classroom settings.

learning_goals: Adapt the EVALOE assessment tool for special education contexts to systematically analyze language development levels.
Observe and evaluate communication functions (expressive/receptive language) and strategies of children with intellectual disabilities, and diagnose vocabulary and grammar usage patterns.
Design teacher collaboration strategies for context-specific communication management, instructional design, and strategy improvement, and develop integrated reading-writing activities.

resources: Adaptive Version of the EVALOE Assessment Tool
Language Sample Videos for Children with Intellectual Disabilities

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
